page.title: 13RELIGION IN GLENLIVET
page.content: There is no church in this block but there is a Church of Scotland at Achbreck in the block to the east where the {Presbyterians }who form the largest denomination in the area, can attend services. The minister himself does not stay at Achbreck but at the Manse nearer Inveravon to the north which is also part of his Parish. {Episcopalians}can attend services at Aberlour and {Roman Catholics }have a Chapel at Tombae in the block to the SE, although the Priest stays at Tomintoul. At the Downan there is a very old {graveyard}which is still in use today by those who wish to be laid to rest among their own folk.
